meaningMnemonic: On your <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>roof</radical> is a <radical>bear</radical>. It is pulling the bamboo off, because it wants to use it to make a long <kanji>pipe</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>pipe</kanji> will be for Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん), who would like some pipes for his house.
